titleStmt.title: Whereas it hath of late been the endeavour of several members of the Physcians Colledg, to reform the abuses of the apothecaries, as well in the prizes as in the composition of their medecines ...
titleStmt.author: Goodall, Charles, 1642-1712.

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Imperfect: creased, with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
